documentation.text:
@dev constructor
@param _owner The address of the owner of the contract

@dev public function for adding multiple users to the whitelist
@param _userAddresses array of user addresses to add to the whitelist

@dev public function for adding a user to the whitelist
@param _userAddress address of a user to add to the whitelist

@dev public function for removing multiple users from the whitelist
@param _userAddresses array of user addresses to remove from the whitelist

@dev public function for removing a user from the whitelist
@param _userAddress address of a user to remove from the whitelist

@dev constructor
@param _owner The address of the owner of the contract

@dev public function for adding multiple users to the whitelist
@param _userAddresses array of user addresses to add to the whitelist

@dev public function for adding a user to the whitelist
@param _userAddress address of a user to add to the whitelist

@dev public function for removing multiple users from the whitelist
@param _userAddresses array of user addresses to remove from the whitelist

@dev public function for removing a user from the whitelist
@param _userAddress address of a user to remove from the whitelist

devdoc.details: Whitelist is a whitelisting contract to check if users are allowed to perform specific actions

addUserToWhitelist(address).details: public function for adding a user to the whitelist

params._userAddress: address of a user to add to the whitelist

addUsersToWhitelist(address[]).details: public function for adding multiple users to the whitelist

params._userAddresses: array of user addresses to add to the whitelist

params._owner: The address of the owner of the contract

isWhitelisted(address).details: public view function to check if the given user is whitelisted

params._userAddress: the address of the user to check

returns._0: true if the user is whitelisted

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeUserFromWhitelist(address).details: public function for removing a user from the whitelist

params._userAddress: address of a user to remove from the whitelist

removeUsersFromWhitelist(address[]).details: public function for removing multiple users from the whitelist

params._userAddresses: array of user addresses to remove from the whitelist

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Whitelist
